channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Toyota Opens Its First North American Lithium Ion Battery Plant
item.description: Toyota has officially opened its first lithium ion battery plant outside of Japan in Liberty, North Carolina. The plant will have capacity of 30-GWh p...

item.title: ‘The Super Mario Galaxy Movie’ Perfectly Casts Rosalina, Gets New Trailer, Release Date
item.description: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie has cast its all-important Rosalina, and she could not be a better pick. Watch the new trailer here.

item.title: Xpanceo, A Dubai Startup, Is Building An AI XR Contact Lens
item.description: Smart contact lens startup Xpanceo, haas raised $250 million to build atom-thin AR lenses to merge vision, biosensing, and AI, ushering in an era of h...

item.title: Want Futureproof Kids In The Age Of AI? Make Things Hard For Them.
item.description: In order for their kids to thrive in the age of AI, parents need to take a step back and take their tablets away.

item.title: ‘ARC Raiders’ Lowers Cosmetic Prices, Has Duo Matchmaking, Talks Raider Deck Plans
item.description: ARC Raiders is moving fast with changes to cosmetic prices, duo matchmaking and raider decks which are live now, or happening soon.

item.title: A good business vs. a useful idea
